page.title: 01LEISURE IN FULHAM D.Tanfield
page.content:
There are a lot of sports facilities in Fulham including Craven Cottage home of Football Club which is situated in Stevenage Road.The Cottage holds 25,000 but because it is a small club the average crowd is around 5,000.Fulham have a 'Junior Black & Whites' for the children of Fulham,who get discounts at some shops and get a chance to join in with competitions and have a meeting once a month.
Near Fulham Football Club is Eternit Whafe Sports Centre with Badminton,5-a- side Football, Weight Training,Tennis and Basketball.It costs 35p to go in and do any sport.Lillie Road has Lillie Road Fitness Centre where you can do Weight Training,Judo,Karate,Boxing & Basket ball. {}
